title: Quinoa with spinach and goat cheese
ingredients: ['1 tablespoon olive oil', '1/2 onion, finely chopped', '1 teaspoon finely chopped garlic', '170g quinoa', '125ml white wine', '425ml chicken stock', '2 teaspoons balsamic vinegar', '1 teaspoon chopped fresh thyme', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '225g mushrooms, sliced', '4 teaspoons balsamic vinegar', '4 tablespoons white wine', '4 tablespoons chicken stock', '1 teaspoon chopped fresh thyme', 'salt and pepper to taste', '280g fresh spinach leaves, washed', '4 tablespoons crumbled goat cheese']
